definition: hey/to feed (an animal, baby, invalid etc)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Give no artificial teats or pacifiers (also called dummies or soothers) to breastfeeding infants.
sentences.chinese: 对母乳喂养的婴儿不要使用人工奶嘴或橡皮奶头。

sentences.english: In addition, certain hormonal changes during breast-feeding may contribute to bone-density loss.
sentences.chinese: 另外，母乳喂养期间激素的变化也会使骨密度降低。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effect of breast-feeding on infectious disease of infants.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨母乳喂养对婴儿患感染性疾病的影响。

sentences.english: Fully-vented bottle design for vacuum-free feeding similar to breastfeeding.
sentences.chinese: 全真空奶瓶设计如同母乳喂养。

sentences.english: Breast-feeding your infant can deliver long-term dividends.
sentences.chinese: 母乳喂养你的婴儿可以得到长期的分红。

sentences.english: I am currently breastfeeding my 10-month-old baby.
sentences.chinese: 我目前正在母乳喂养我10个月大的婴儿。

sentences.english: This information is also found as part of the professional Breastfeeding Logs.
sentences.chinese: 本文转载自专业的母乳喂养日志。

sentences.english: Breastfeeding is one of the most effective ways to ensure child health and survival.
sentences.chinese: 母乳喂养是确保儿童生存和健康的最有效措施之一。

sentences.english: Up to what age can a baby stay well nourished by just being breastfed?
sentences.chinese: 婴儿到多大年龄仅接受母乳喂养就可获得充分营养？

sentences.english: She had already decided, months earlier, that she would not breast-feed.
sentences.chinese: 在数月前，她早已决定不采用直接母乳喂养。

sentences.english: For the majority of new mothers, breastfeeding is highly recommended.
sentences.chinese: 对于大多数新的母亲，母乳喂养是倍受欢迎的。

sentences.english: There is yet another addition to the list of reasons to breastfeed.
sentences.chinese: 对于母乳喂养还有另外的一些好处。
她们中的一半决定进行母乳喂养。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the influence of mother-milk feed on newborn baby.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨母乳喂养对新生儿的影响。

sentences.english: Inform all pregnant women about the benefits and management of breastfeeding.
sentences.chinese: 向所有孕妇宣传母乳喂养的好处与处理方法。

sentences.english: She would have preferred to breast-feed.

definition: a mom (mother of a young child)
